snippet: The secretary of state, in Paris for the climate talks, finds himself for the second time this year at the center of crucial negotiations on the international stage.
abstract: Legacy of Sec of State John Kerry hinges on outcome of Paris climate talks, for which he has spent years laying groundwork; amid skepticism over current state of agreement, Kerry is optimistic about reaching global deal on issue he sees, against often fierce conservative opposition, as matter of foreign policy and national security.
lead_paragraph: The secretary of state, in Paris for the climate talks, finds himself for the second time this year at the center of crucial negotiations on the international stage.

headline.main: Kerry in Familiar Spot: Trying to Coax Deal in Meeting’s Closing Days
headline.print_headline: Kerry in Familiar Spot: Trying to Coax Deal in Meeting’s Closing Days

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
